fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Instead of Houses and Hotels, Discordian properties may have other things on them.
- Rent does not double if you own the full set
- Discordian properties must be named after a user in the server and may only be created with permission of the user.
- Typically have special effects
- Does not require all properties in the set to build houses/hotels (or whatever replaces them).
